TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit CompilerParameters extends System.Object

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComVisible(false)
System.Serializable

summary.span: 表示用于调用编译器的参数。

span.span: Represents the parameters used to invoke a compiler.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个对象表示的设置和选项接口。A object represents the settings and options for an interface. 如果您正在编译的可执行程序，则必须设置属性设置为`true`。If you are compiling an executable program, you must set the property to `true`. 当设置为`false`，编译器将生成类库。When the is set to `false`, the compiler will generate a class library. 默认情况下，一个新使用初始化其属性设置为`false`。By default, a new is initialized with its property set to `false`. 如果要从 CodeDOM 图编译可执行文件，则必须在该图中定义 。If you are compiling an executable from a CodeDOM graph, a must be defined in the graph. 如果有多个代码入口点，则可以指示定义入口点，以通过设置到的类的名称使用的类属性。If there are multiple code entry points, you can indicate the class that defines the entry point to use by setting the name of the class to the property. 可以指定在输出程序集的文件名属性。You can specify a file name for the output assembly in the property. 否则，将使用默认的输出文件名。Otherwise, a default output file name will be used. 若要生成的程序集包含调试信息，请设置属性设置为`true`。To include debug information in a generated assembly, set the property to `true`. 如果你的项目引用的任何程序集，则必须为中的项中指定的程序集名称设置为属性的调用编译时所使用。If your project references any assemblies, you must specify the assembly names as items in a set to the property of the used when invoking compilation. 您可以编译写入内存而不是磁盘设置程序集属性设置为`true`。You can compile an assembly that is written to memory rather than disk by setting the property to `true`. 在内存中生成程序集时，代码可从 的 属性中获取对生成的程序集的引用。When an assembly is generated in memory, your code can obtain a reference to the generated assembly from the property of a . 如果程序集写入到磁盘，你可以从生成的程序集获取的路径属性的。If an assembly is written to disk, you can obtain the path to the generated assembly from the property of a . 若要指定暂停编译的警告等级，请将 属性设置为一个整数，表示暂停编译的警告等级。To specify a warning level at which to halt compilation, set the property to an integer that represents the warning level at which to halt compilation. 你还可以配置编译器通过设置遇到警告时暂停编译属性设置为`true`。You can also configure the compiler to halt compilation if warnings are encountered by setting the property to `true`. 若要指定在调用编译进程时使用的自定义命令行参数字符串，请在 属性中设置该字符串。To specify a custom command-line arguments string to use when invoking the compilation process, set the string in the property. 如果在调用编译器进程时需要 Win32 安全令牌，请在 属性中指定该令牌。If a Win32 security token is required to invoke the compiler process, specify the token in the property. 若要编译的程序集包含.NET Framework 资源文件，将添加到的资源文件的名称属性。To include .NET Framework resource files in the compiled assembly, add the names of the resource files to the property. 若要引用另一个程序集中的.NET Framework 资源，将添加到的资源文件的名称属性。To reference .NET Framework resources in another assembly, add the names of the resource files to the property. 若要编译的程序集包含 Win32 资源文件，指定的名称中的 Win32 资源文件属性。To include a Win32 resource file in the compiled assembly, specify the name of the Win32 resource file in the property. > [!NOTE] > 此类包含一个链接要求和继承要求在类级别应用于所有成员。This class contains a link demand and an inheritance demand at the class level that applies to all members. 一个直接调用方或派生的类没有完全信任权限时引发。A is thrown when either the immediate caller or the derived class does not have full-trust permission. 有关安全要求的详细信息，请参阅[链接需求](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md)并[继承需求](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/x4yx82e6(v=vs.100))。For details about security demands, see [Link Demands](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md) and [Inheritance Demands](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/x4yx82e6(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的示例生成一个简单的 Hello World 程序 CodeDOM 源关系图。The following example builds a CodeDOM source graph for a simple Hello World program. 然后，源将保存到文件，被编译到可执行文件，并运行。The source is then saved to a file, compiled into an executable, and run. `CompileCode`方法演示了如何使用类，以指定不同的编译器设置和选项。The `CompileCode` method illustrates how to use the class to specify various compiler settings and options. [!code-cpp[CompilerParametersExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CompilerParametersExample/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[CompilerParametersExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CompilerParametersExample/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[CompilerParametersExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CompilerParametersExample/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置调用编译器时使用的可选命令行参数。

span.span: Gets or sets optional command-line arguments to use when invoking the compiler.

value.span: 用于编译器的任何附加命令行参数。

span.span: Any additional command-line arguments for the compiler.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用命令行编译器时，通常包括在命令行上的此字符串。An typically includes this string on the command line when invoking a command-line compiler. 默认情况下，此属性包含空字符串。By default, this property contains an empty string. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用指定不同的编译器设置和选项。The following example illustrates using to specify various compiler settings and options. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[CompilerParametersExample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CompilerParametersExample/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[CompilerParametersExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CompilerParametersExample/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CompilerParametersExample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CompilerParametersExample/VB/source.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ CoreAssemblyFileName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.CoreAssemblyFileName : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置包含基类类型（如 、 或 ）的核心或标准程序集的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the core or standard assembly that contains basic types such as , , or .

value.span: 包含基本类型的核心程序集的名称。

span.span: The name of the core assembly that contains basic types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此属性的值是空字符串或 `null`，则编译器将使用默认核心程序集。If the value of this property is an empty string or `null`, the compiler uses the default core assembly. 根据编译器版本，默认核心程序集可能是位于 Framework 目录或引用程序集目录中的 mscorlib.dll 或 System.Runtime.dll。Depending on the compiler version, the default core assembly may be mscorlib.dll or System.Runtime.dll in a Framework directory or reference assembly directory. 如果此属性的值不为空，则代码文档对象模型 (CodeDOM) 将显式引用指定程序集并发出导致编译器在编译期间不隐式引用任何程序集的编译器选项。If the value of this property is not empty, the Code Document Object Model (CodeDOM) explicitly references the specified assembly and emits compiler options that cause the compiler to not reference any assemblies implicitly during compilation.. 对于默认情况下仅隐式引用核心或标准程序集的编译器，此属性可单独使用。For compilers that reference the core or standard assembly only implicitly by default, this property can be used on its own. 对于隐式引用程序集除了核心或标准程序集的编译器，使用此选项可能需要指定其他项中的属性。For compilers that implicitly reference assemblies in addition to the core or standard assembly, using this option may require specifying additional entries in the property. > [!NOTE] > 或 实现可以选择忽略此属性。An or implementation may choose to ignore this property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property EmbeddedResources As StringCollection

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComVisible(false)
get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取要在编译程序集输出时包含的 .NET Framework 资源文件。

span.span: Gets the .NET Framework resource files to include when compiling the assembly output.

value.span: 一个集合，包含要在生成的程序集中包含的 .NET Framework 资源的文件路径。

span.span: A collection that contains the file paths of .NET Framework resources to include in the generated assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 嵌入的资源是内置到生成的程序集输出文件。Embedded resources are built into the generated assembly output file. 包括通过此属性的文件是类似于`/resource`支持许多.NET Framework 编译器的命令行参数。Including files through this property is similar to the `/resource` command-line argument supported by many of the .NET Framework compilers. 并非所有的编译器支持.NET Framework 资源文件，因此应进行测试以这种支持通过调用方法的标志。Not all compilers support .NET Framework resource files, so you should test for this support by calling the method with the flag . 将一个或多个.NET Framework 资源文件路径添加到返回已编译的程序集中嵌入的文件资源。Add one or more .NET Framework resource file paths to the returned to embed the file resources in the compiled assembly. 在编译错误; 中添加重复或无效的文件路径结果请确保每个字符串指定有效的.NET Framework 资源文件的唯一路径。Adding a duplicate or invalid file path results in compilation errors; ensure that each string specifies a unique path to a valid .NET Framework resource file. 使用包括默认值或非特定区域性的.NET Framework 资源的程序集; 使用属性来引用.NET Framework 资源附属程序集中。Use to include default or neutral culture .NET Framework resources for an assembly; use the property to reference .NET Framework resources in satellite assemblies. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用指定不同的编译器设置和选项。The following example illustrates using to specify various compiler settings and options. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[CompilerParametersExample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CompilerParametersExample/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[CompilerParametersExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CompilerParametersExample/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CompilerParametersExample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CompilerParametersExample/VB/source.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property LinkedResources As StringCollection

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComVisible(false)
get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取当前源中引用的 .NET Framework 资源文件。

span.span: Gets the .NET Framework resource files that are referenced in the current source.

value.span: 一个集合，包含源要引用的 .NET Framework 资源的文件路径。

span.span: A collection that contains the file paths of .NET Framework resources that are referenced by the source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 链接的资源文件使您的程序集引用而无需在程序集中嵌入的实际资源的.NET Framework 资源。Linked resource files allow your assembly to reference .NET Framework resources without embedding the actual resources in the assembly. 引用文件通过此属性是类似于`/linkresource`支持许多.NET Framework 编译器的命令行参数。Referencing files through this property is similar to the `/linkresource` command-line argument supported by many of the .NET Framework compilers. 并非所有的编译器支持.NET Framework 资源文件，因此应进行测试以这种支持通过调用方法的标志。Not all compilers support .NET Framework resource files, so you should test for this support by calling the method with the flag . 将一个或多个.NET Framework 资源文件路径添加到返回中编译的程序集创建的资源的链接。Add one or more .NET Framework resource file paths to the returned to create links for the resources in the compiled assembly. 在编译错误; 中添加重复或无效的文件路径结果请确保每个字符串指定有效的.NET Framework 资源文件的唯一路径。Adding a duplicate or invalid file path results in compilation errors; ensure that each string specifies a unique path to a valid .NET Framework resource file. 使用来引用在附属程序集中的.NET Framework 资源本地化为特定区域性; 使用属性来将资源嵌入到编译的程序集。Use to reference .NET Framework resources in satellite assemblies, localized for a particular culture; use the property to embed the resources into the compiled assembly. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用指定不同的编译器设置和选项。The following example illustrates using to specify various compiler settings and options. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[CompilerParametersExample#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CompilerParametersExample/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[CompilerParametersExample#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/CompilerParametersExample/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CompilerParametersExample#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/CompilerParametersExample/VB/source.vb#2)]

The name of the output assembly.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用指定不同的编译器设置和选项。The following example illustrates using to specify various compiler settings and options. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. span.span: A collection that contains the assembly names that are referenced by the source to compile.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字符串集合应包含，或是包含当前项目所引用的程序集。The string collection should consist of, or include, the assemblies referenced by the current project. 将程序集文件的名称添加到返回导入程序集清单，并引用当前项目中的程序集类型信息。Add assembly file names to the returned to import the assembly manifest and reference the assembly type information in the current project. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用指定不同的编译器设置和选项。The following example illustrates using to specify various compiler settings and options. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. summary.span: 获取或设置包含临时文件的集合。

span.span: Gets or sets the collection that contains the temporary files.
A collection that contains the temporary files.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合中的临时文件是保留还是删除编译器活动值的基础完成后集合中的属性。The temporary files in the collection are retained or deleted upon the completion of compiler activity based on the value of the property in the collection. 如果使用创建集合属性会设置构造函数与`keepFiles`参数设置为`true`。The property is set if the collection is created using the constructor with the `keepFiles` parameter set to `true`. > [!NOTE] > 此类包含一个链接要求和继承要求在类级别应用于所有成员。This class contains a link demand and an inheritance demand at the class level that applies to all members. 一个直接调用方或派生的类没有完全信任权限时引发。A is thrown when either the immediate caller or the derived class does not have full-trust permission. 有关安全要求的详细信息，请参阅[链接需求](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md)并[继承需求](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/x4yx82e6(v=vs.100))。For details about security demands, see [Link Demands](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md) and [Inheritance Demands](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/x4yx82e6(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用指定不同的编译器设置和选项。The following example illustrates using to specify various compiler settings and options. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. permission.span: 对于直接调用方的完全信任。

summary.span: 获取或设置要链接到已编译程序集中的 Win32 资源文件的文件名。

span.span: Gets or sets the file name of a Win32 resource file to link into the compiled assembly.

value.span: 要链接到已编译程序集中的 Win32 资源文件。

span.span: A Win32 resource file that will be linked into the compiled assembly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 链接文件通过此属性是类似于`/winres`和`/winresource`支持许多.NET Framework 编译器的命令行参数。Linking files through this property is similar to the `/winres` and `/winresource` command-line arguments supported by many of the .NET Framework compilers. 使用Win32 资源文件编译到程序集。Use to compile a Win32 resource file into the assembly. 使用或使用.NET Framework 资源文件进行编译。Use or to compile with .NET Framework resource files. 并非所有的编译器支持 Win32 资源文件，因此你应该将此支持，然后再通过调用链接的资源文件的代码生成器方法的标志。Not all compilers support Win32 resource files, so you should test a code generator for this support before linking a resource file by calling the method with the flag .
